content: we just confirmed that the windows repl (with llvm) does work with --release, but overflows the stack without it. There are also some quirks with powershell and the repl is very slow because dynamic linking is slow on windows (currently, maybe we can cache work somehow)
still, that's great progress! :smiley:
as the old saying goes, "slow repl is better than no repl" :big_smile:

Richard Feldman said:

as the old saying goes, "slow repl is better than no repl" :big_smile:

It's probably faster to run the WASM REPL in the cloud and stream the module bytes over the network than linking on Windows RN. :sad: :turtle:
